title: Redirecting gdb output to stdout wihile using pwndbg
content: I am using pwndbg plugin with gdb. When any program that prints to stdout is run under gdb, I seem to not being able to see the output from the program during the debugging session. How can I redirect the output to the same terminal as that of gdb or to a different one?

comments.text: are you sure that you are not missing the output in the vast information provided by pwndbg?

answers_data.content:
set logging file ~/pwndbg.log
set logging on

Then run any command like info functions You will find the output in the file specified.
